text: Now here's a Special Edition DRUMSTICK flavour that has only one reaction: "MMM!". NESTLÃ‰ DRUMSTICK Special Edition Toffee Graham Crunch Frozen Dessert Cones is an elevated take on our Caramel Classic. It combines a crisp wafer cone with creamy vanilla frozen dessert and a caramel core with an exclusive toffee coating, topped with buttery graham pieces, the perfect way to delight your taste buds. Proudly crafted in London, Ontario with Canadian dairy.
Crisp wafer cones filled with creamy vanilla and caramel core, topped with delicious toffee coating and buttery graham pieces
Creamy and tasty, made with Canadian dairy. We are proud to support the Canadian dairy industry!
DRUMSTICK has been THE ORIGINAL SUNDAE CONE since 1928
